short_summary: Procurement of 5 plotters, for the Department of National Defence
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement to purchase 5 plotters. This Contract is for the supply and delivery of the equipment
full_summary:
# IT Goods and Services | Request for Proposal for Plotters

## Notice Information

* **Notice Number**: 2BP3-137159
* **Date of Publication**: April 18, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time**: May 3, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM018724/22565

## Notice Description

Shared Services Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of 5 plotters for the Department of National Defence.

## Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Shared Services Canada
* **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K0A 0C3

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Jesse Squirrell
* **Email**: [jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 613-791-6257

## Notice Documents

The following documents are available for downloading from the Shared Services Canada Public Services and Procurement website:

* [Attachment 1: PDF document 1](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/741983AC-72B7-4CC5-9813-5805D209B8B3)
* [Attachment 2: PDF document 2](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/89DAAC11-7B66-468F-B5C1-62F1B9F37B3D)
* ...
* [Attachment N: PDF document N](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/F7159039-6C97-4187-A628-A8A714C9D6D1)

## Requirements

The proposed plotters must meet the technical requirements identified in the documents attached to this notice. The supplier is responsible for obtaining all necessary licenses and permits to deliver the equipment.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical acceptability
* Price
* Delivery timelines

## Trade Agreement

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
